DataElement.preferredName: Patient Disease-Free Survival At Six Month Post Begin BCG Regimen Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which the patient was disease free at six months after starting BCG regimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Disease-Free Survival At Six Month Post Begin BCG Regimen
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Period after successful treatment in which there is no appearance of the symptoms or effects of the disease._Used to indicate position, location, or state._A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins._An immunotherapy regimen consisting of Bacillus Calmette-Guerin (BCG) that may be used in the treatment of bladder cancer.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Disease-Free Survival At Six Month Post Begin BCG Regimen
Property.preferredDefinition: Period after successful treatment in which there is no appearance of the symptoms or effects of the disease.:Used to indicate position, location, or state.:A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.:An immunotherapy regimen consisting of Bacillus Calmette-Guerin (BCG) that may be used in the treatment of bladder cancer.

Concepts.definition: The length of time after treatment for a specific disease during which a patient survives with no sign of recurrence of the disease.
Used to indicate position, location, or state.
A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
An immunotherapy regimen consisting of Bacillus Calmette-Guerin (BCG) that may be used in the treatment of bladder cancer.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
